realm.name: admin
realm.description: Admin role for the kaapana realm.

realm.name: user
realm.description: None admin user with limited access in the kaapana realm

realm.name: dcm4chee-admin
realm.description: Grant access to enitre dcm4chee web API

passwordPolicy: notUsername(undefined) and specialChars(1) and upperCase(1) and lowerCase(1) and digits(1) and passwordHistory(3) and length(8)
